prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered standing pose with hands extended in exploratory gesture, chibi proportions with large starry head suggesting angelic realms through sharp, layered cut-outs with sharpie-like black crease lines for depth. Hair or ethereal appendage horns incorporating seal patterns from sacred symbolism. Outfit is unique: starry hooded robe with layered veils in light grey ethereal gauze, elaborate with invocation motifs and mini-orb accessories suggesting celestial exploration. Include subtle accessory like glowing scrying crystal with magical essence wisps. Environmental effect: faint starry aura patterns around the character. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on light exploratory essence with starry wisps and occult veils.
